member.name: Properties:PropertySyntax
member.code: modifier* propertyName "=>" identifier [ "??" anyButSemiColonSymbol* ] ";" | modifier* propertyName "{" "get" "=>" identifier [ "??" anyButSemiColonSymbol* ] ";" [ setter ] "}" | modifier* propertyName "{" "get" "{" anyButReturnSymbol* "return" identifier [ "??" anyButSemiColonSymbol* ] ";" "}" [ setter ] "}"
